Babitha Reddy                             Phone: 4704044761 
   email: bbabithareddy@yahoo.com 
        LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/babitha-reddy-674bb116a 
SUMMARY 
• Over 10 years of IT experience in using SQL, PL/SQL and ETL methodologies for supporting 
Data  Extraction,  Data  Migration,  Data  Transformation,  and  loading  using  Informatica  Power 
Centre, MSBI suite (SSIS), and Manual testing for Client/Server and Web based applications. 
• Experience in developing data pipelines with AWS EMR, S3, Glue, Glue Catalogue and Athena 
along with Spark and PySpark. 
• Expertise  in  OLTP/OLAP  System  Study,  Analysis  and  E-R  modelling,  developing  Database 
Schemas  like  Star  schema  and  Snowflake  schema  used  in  relational,  dimensional,  and 
multidimensional modelling. 
• Good understanding and exposure to Unity Catalog for data Governance in the Delta Lakehouse. 
• Proficient in designing and developing dashboards and reports to visualize and analyze complex

• Good understanding and exposure to Unity Catalog for data Governance in the Delta Lakehouse. 
• Proficient in designing and developing dashboards and reports to visualize and analyze complex 
datasets,  enabling  data-driven  decision-making  across  the  organization  using  Power  BI, 
Tableau and AWS QuickSight. 
• Good understanding and hands on experience of Azure Databricks and Snowflake along with 
DevOps technologies like Git, Jenkins, Docker, DevSecOps. 
• Exposure and knowledge of GenAI and LLM’s: AWS Bedrock, AWS CodeWhisperer, Gen AI on 
Databricks. 
• Scrum Master experience. 
• Engaged in the bidding process to secure new projects and extend contracts. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Cloud Technologies 
AWS-S3,  Redshift,  EMR, Kinesis, Lambda, Azure, Snowflake, 
Databricks, GCP 
DevOps Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, DevSecOps, Terraform 
ETL/ELT Tools 
Informatica PowerCenter, SSIS, AWS Glue, Azure Data Factory, 
dbt

Databricks, GCP

dbt 
Reporting Tools Power BI, Tableau, AWS QuickSight, SSRS 
Data Modelling Visio, IBM Rational Rose 
Database/Data warehouse Oracle, MS SQL Server, MySql, Redshift, Snowflake 
Programming Languages 
SQL, PL/SQL, JavaScript,  C++,  C,  JAVA,  R, Python, Apache 
Spark, PySpark, SnowPark 
Version Control Git, GitHub, AWS CodeCommit 
Agile JIRA, Kanban 
 
EDUCATION 
 
• Master of Science in Computer Science, North Dakota State University, USA. (Dec, 2015) 
• Master of Technology, Computer Science Engineering, Osmania University, India. (Oct, 2010) 
• Master of Science in Information Systems, Osmania University, India. (Sep, 2003) 
• Bachelor of Computer Applications, Osmania University, India. (Sep, 2001) 
 
CERTIFICATION 
 
• SnowPro Core Certification – July 2024 
• AWS Certified Data Analytics – Speciality – Feb - 2023

• Bachelor of Computer Applications, Osmania University, India. (Sep, 2001) 
 
CERTIFICATION 
 
• SnowPro Core Certification – July 2024 
• AWS Certified Data Analytics – Speciality – Feb - 2023 
• Azure Data Fundamentals – Certification - Oct - 2022 
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate – Jun - 2020 
• Oracle PL/SQL Developer Certified Associate – Oct – 2016

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
Morgan Stanley, USA            Dec 2024 – till date 
Role: Senior Data Engineer 
 
Capgemini, UK            Feb 2022 – Nov 2024 
 
Client: BP (British Petroleum), UK      
Role: Senior Data Engineer 
Responsibilities 
 
• Developed a real-time analytics platform to ingest and transform data from multiple sources 
using Airflow, dbt, and Snowflake. dbt was used to implement business logic and transform 
raw  data  into  analytical  datasets,  while  Airflow  orchestrated  the  ETL  processes.  Power  BI 
dashboards  were  built  on  top  of  these  datasets,  providing  insights  into  marketing 
performance. 
• Designed a sales performance dashboard using Snowflake, dbt, and Airflow to automate ETL 
processes  from  multiple  data  sources.  dbt  models  were  used  to  cleanse,  transform,  and 
aggregate  the  data,  which  was  then  visualized  in  Tableau  for  real-time  insights  into  sales 
trends.

aggregate  the  data,  which  was  then  visualized  in  Tableau  for  real-time  insights  into  sales 
trends. 
• Architected   end-to-end   data   pipelines   in   Snowflake   and   Azure   using   dbt   for   data 
transformations  and  Airflow  for  workflow  orchestration.  Ensured  scalable,  maintainable 
pipelines for processing large datasets. 
• Developed ETL processes to integrate data from multiple sources using Azure Data Factory, 
Databricks,  and  Airflow  into  Snowflake,  optimizing  the  pipelines  for  performance  and 
scalability. 
• Built  complex  SQL  transformations  using  dbt  to  ensure  consistency  across  multiple  data 
models and datasets, reducing manual coding and improving collaboration with analysts. 
• Automated key workflows and scheduled ETL jobs using Airflow, monitoring and debugging 
potential issues through Airflow’s user interface. 
• Utilized Python and SQL for developing custom data transformations, ensuring data quality

potential issues through Airflow’s user interface. 
• Utilized Python and SQL for developing custom data transformations, ensuring data quality 
and performance optimization for downstream reporting tools like Power BI and Tableau. 
• Worked with data science teams to deliver insights using Python, improving data access, data 
quality, and pipeline performance. 
 
 
Client: McDonald’s, UK            
Role: Lead Data Engineer 
Responsibilities 
 
• Build, scale and maintain data pipelines to process millions of daily transactions of customers 
from Redshift databases to AWS S3, Glue, accessible through Athena on an EMR cluster.  
• Build datasets for capturing available customer journeys, third party deliveries, tokenisation, 
basket analysis and occasion analysis for both UK and Ireland markets. 
• Developed and maintained PySpark in conjunction with Snowflake to process structured and 
semi-structured data formats, such as JSON, Parquet, Avro, and ORC, for diverse business

• Developed and maintained PySpark in conjunction with Snowflake to process structured and 
semi-structured data formats, such as JSON, Parquet, Avro, and ORC, for diverse business 
use cases. 
• Worked  with  structured  data  in  Snowflake  to  improve  performance  by  various  advanced 
techniques like Bucketing, Partitioning, and Optimizing self joins 
• Utilized Python and SQL for developing custom data transformations, ensuring data quality 
and performance optimization for downstream reporting tools like Power BI and Tableau. 
• Used Snowflake cloud data warehouse for integrating data from multiple source system which 
include nested JSON formatted data into Snowflake table. 
• Hands-on experience on developing SQL Scripts for automation purpose. 
• Code review and deployment in Code Commit. 
• Data quality tests with Great Expectations framework and Glue DataQuality 
• Internal and external stakeholder management.

• Code review and deployment in Code Commit. 
• Data quality tests with Great Expectations framework and Glue DataQuality 
• Internal and external stakeholder management. 
• Mentor  and  assist fellow engineers both  within  and beyond  my  areas  of responsibility  and 
expertise. 
• Workflow management using JIRA. 
• Documentation captured in the confluence.

Currys (previously Dixons Carphone) – Multiplay, UK       Sep 2017 – Feb 2022 
Dixons Carphone is Europe’s number one Electrical and Telecommunications Retailer and Services 
Company, which operate across  nine  countries. Multiplay  is  a  part  of  the business where  the 
broadband, home phone and television services from top suppliers in the market are promoted to 
customers across the UK. 
 
Role: Data Manager  
Responsibilities: 
   
• Managing pricing and promotional data for the Multiplay broadband products for various sales 
channels. 
• Creating/adding new products/propositions in the pricing database 
• Creating/updating services, equipment, packages (products) and offers (promotions) on the 
base Multiplay broadband packages/products. 
• Wrote  custom Python scripts  to  automate  data  extraction  from  APIs   and  perform 
transformations before loading into data lakes on Azure Blob Storage. 
• Coordinating with the trading team to decide the upcoming propositions.

transformations before loading into data lakes on Azure Blob Storage. 
• Coordinating with the trading team to decide the upcoming propositions. 
• Launching  products  on  various  sales  channels  (Instore  Retail,  Indirect/Call  centres, 
Ecommerce) on time and when it is needed. 
• Creating workflows in CRM for gift cards, bill credits, cash back vouchers along with managing 
campaigns and partners in CRM. 
• An  expert  in  using  the  tool,  the  DMT  (Data  Management  Tool),  for  managing  the  pricing 
database. 
• Weekly  reports  on  the  sales  and  submission  rates  for  individual  broadband,  phone  and  tv 
services providers on various sales channels: Ecommerce, Retail and Partnerships. 
• Developed and optimized complex PL/SQL stored procedures and functions to automate ETL 
workflows, improve performance, and handle large datasets efficiently. 
• Utilized advanced SQL joins (inner, outer, and self-joins) and subqueries within PL/SQL for

workflows, improve performance, and handle large datasets efficiently. 
• Utilized advanced SQL joins (inner, outer, and self-joins) and subqueries within PL/SQL for 
data aggregation, transformation, and integration across multiple relational databases. 
• Implemented and maintained database triggers for real-time data integrity and event-driven 
processing, as well as cursors to efficiently process row-by-row operations on large datasets. 
• Active member in innovating new features and delegating the ideas to the developers and 
the stakeholders of the applications. 
• Mentoring new team members in process, data, and applications. 
 
Microsoft, M&O CMO (Fargo, USA.)           Jan 2016 – Jun 2016 
 
Microsoft is an American multinational company, which develops, manufactures, licenses, supports 
and sells computer software, personal computers and services. The project goal is to transform and

Microsoft is an American multinational company, which develops, manufactures, licenses, supports 
and sells computer software, personal computers and services. The project goal is to transform and 
consolidate marketing data from multiple source systems to one centralized place, which involved a 
lot  of  business  and  technical  analysis, analysing and  reporting  on  sales  data  across  product 
categories and channels to support company sales and marketing efforts.  
 
Role: Data Analyst 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Understanding, analysing, and  transforming  the  data  (marketing  leads)  from  various 
marketing operations. 
• Developed a wide range of Business Intelligence solutions used to manage output of large 
data volumes for marketing managers. SSIS packages developed and deployed using Team 
Foundation Server. 
• Use ETL processes to achieve effective business use of high volumes of data.

data volumes for marketing managers. SSIS packages developed and deployed using Team 
Foundation Server. 
• Use ETL processes to achieve effective business use of high volumes of data. 
• Build and maintain SQL scripts and complex queries for data analysis and extraction. 
• Assisting with the transition to a new marketing automation system, analysing existing data 
practices and making recommendations for improvements. 
• Generating reports using Power BI for various marketing teams. 
• Ensure  best  practices  are  applied  and  integrity  of  data  is  maintained  through  security, 
documentation, and change management. 
• Mentor and coach new team members on business process and technical aspects.

Open Access Technology International (OATI) Minneapolis, USA       Jan 2015 – Aug 2015 
 
Open  Access  Technology  International,  Inc.  is  the  industry  leader  in  the  North  American  Energy 
Industry, providing advanced application solutions as web-based services to over 700 customers. The 
project that I worked on was aimed at Design, Development and Migration of OATI products from 
heterogeneous data sources, upgradation of Informatica and Oracle Database on Linux. The project 
involves Informatica data services to profile and document the structure and quality of all data. 
 
Role: Junior Software Developer  
Responsibilities: 
 
• Gathering  business  requirements  for  the  data-warehouse  as  well  as  business-intelligence 
reports to be used by the management. 
• Creating, monitoring, modifying, & communicating the project plan with other team members. 
• Worked on power centre tools including Designer/Repository, Workflow Manager/Monitor.

• Creating, monitoring, modifying, & communicating the project plan with other team members. 
• Worked on power centre tools including Designer/Repository, Workflow Manager/Monitor. 
• Extensively used Informatica Transformations like Source Qualifier, Rank, Expression, Router, 
Filter, Lookup, Joiner, Aggregator, Normalizer, Sorter etc. and all transformation properties 
using Informatica Power centre 9.5. 
• Translate Business  processes  into  Informatica  mappings  for  building  Data  marts  by  using 
Informatica. 
• Conversion of WML (web plus) scripts into C# .net programs using .net framework. 
• Responsible for writing test cases to cover overall quality assurance using HP ALM. 
• Responsible for Integration, Functional and End to End testing. 
• Involvement in Test Execution, Results Analysing and Defect Reporting. 
• Attend daily status call with internal team and weekly calls with client and updated the status 
report. 
 
Sri Nipuna Technologies      June 2011 – May 2013

• Attend daily status call with internal team and weekly calls with client and updated the status 
report. 
 
Sri Nipuna Technologies      June 2011 – May 2013 
Role: Informatica Developer       
Responsibilities: 
 
• Involved  in  complete  life  cycle  of  developing enterprise data  warehouse  application  and 
developed ETL architecture using Informatica. 
• Designed data warehouse target tables by using dimensional modelling techniques: Star and 
Snowflake schemas. 
• Fact and dimension tables creation. 
• Extract data from various data sources, transformed according to business requirements and 
loading into the targets. 
• Created   complex   mappings using   various   transformations:   Source   Qualifier,   Joiner, 
Aggregator, Expression, Filter, Router, Lookup etc., 
• Unit  testing  and  user  acceptance  testing  to  check  whether  the  data  loads  into  target  are 
accurate and satisfying the user requirements.

• Unit  testing  and  user  acceptance  testing  to  check  whether  the  data  loads  into  target  are 
accurate and satisfying the user requirements. 
• Documenting in the confluence pages, mentoring and knowledge transfer.
